author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed handling of UTF-8 characters in ezcConsoleTable.
- Fixed issue #14073: ConsoleTools is now binary safe, presuming UTF-8 input.
Note that the component now depends on ext/iconv which is bundled with PHP
